text: @realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP The COVID-19 is exploding and destroying our nation, killing our citizens because of your inept response. Russia is paying the Taliban cash to hunt and kill our precious soldiers and you do nothing except to cozy up to Putin.  Shame, shame, shame on you. Resign!
